title: 96/596/EC: Commission Decision of 2 October 1996 amending Decision 92/452/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams and embryo production teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 2 October 1996 amending Decision 92/452/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams and embryo production teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community (Text with EEA relevance) (96/596/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. In part 2 of the Annex to Decision 92/452/EEC, in respect of New Zealand, the following team is added:
>TABLE>
2. In part 3 of the Annex to Decision 92/452/EEC, in respect of the United States of America:
a) the following teams are added:
>TABLE>
b) the following team is deleted:
>TABLE>
c) the following teams:
>TABLE>

>TABLE>
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 October 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
